data1.Desc: The “Master/Slave” terms are used instead of “Primary/Secondary” in the success window of the Multi-Region WordPress Cluster package
The Open in Browser button in the Redis/PostgreSQL Multi-Regional Cluster installation success window does not work
An error occurs if the Let’s Encrypt add-on is installed for the environment with an external domain and incorrectly set up DNS
An error occurs when cloning an environment with the BitNinja add-on installed
The WordPress packages are missing the ability to select the preferred PHP version
The Let’s Encrypt add-on does not work with environment domain names converted to Punycode
The Rocket.Chat package does not work after restarting the environment
An error occurs during the Plesk package installation
An error occurs after the DjangoCMS package installation
An error occurs when installing the Drupal package with the 8.2 PHP engine version
An error occurs when installing Moodle package with the 8.2 PHP engine version
The Let’s Encrypt add-on installation does not return an error when installed with the incorrect domain name
The PerconaDB icon is missing on the platform dashboard
Unsupported PostgreSQL version on the NGINX Ruby template
The custom environment variables declared via the .jelenv file are unavailable on the NGINX PHP containers
The FTP add-on does not provide access to the home directory on the Spring Boot stack
The .NET stacks have a weak default password
The Export tab is not working in PHPMyAdmin for the LEMP/LLSMP templates
The Redis module is missing for the LiteSpeed 6 stack with PHP 8 engine
No error message in the Pgpool-II node’s logs upon the followprimary.sh script failure
The Pgpool-II node incorrectly detects the database primary for the two-node cluster

data2.Desc: An error occurs when mounting files from some custom Docker containers
Errors are logged during projects auto-deploy on containers with enabled sendmail functionality
An error occurs when executing some commands that include a file download operation
Custom Docker containers cannot be created from images that use the OCI manifest schema
A scroll slider appears in the environment configuration settings panel even if there is enough space to fit the content
The shared files owner is changed to root when resetting a password for the FTP add-on on the Shared Storage node
The URL_DOCS_OOM_KILLER_TROUBLESHOOTING placeholder is not replaced with a link in emails
Firewall management via the user dashboard becomes too slow after adding the 'Deny Internet Access' rule
An error occurs during PHP stacks’ ZDT (zero downtime) deployment
The platform dashboard cannot be accessed using the Safari browser
A slow response and an incorrect error returned when accessing a non-existing environment on port 4848
Incorrect custom SSL certificate management on the SLBs after the environment deletion
The cloudlets usage is not displayed for the Ubuntu VM environments, and the topology cannot be changed
Performance degradation after importing an environment into the shared group as a collaborator
The custom domains field is not updated after the Let’s Encrypt add-on reconfiguration
New account registration does not work if the provided password contains the backslash character
